artifacts.summary: Deep investigation confirming temporal backward direction cannot be completed - fundamental omega-rule limitation

findings.reason: Fundamental structural difference between modal and temporal saturation
findings.key_insight: Modal saturation adds NEW families as witnesses; temporal backward requires truth at ALL times within SAME family which is fixed

strategies_evaluated.name: Temporal Saturation via Zorn
strategies_evaluated.reason: Cannot add new times - time is a fixed domain D

strategies_evaluated.name: Contrapositive Approach
strategies_evaluated.reason: Cannot extract specific time witness from MCS membership

strategies_evaluated.name: Formula Structure Induction
strategies_evaluated.reason: Each induction step has same fundamental gap

strategies_evaluated.name: Frame Structure Exploitation
strategies_evaluated.reason: Temporal operators quantify over times, not families

strategies_evaluated.name: Index Domain Properties
strategies_evaluated.reason: Ordering properties don't bridge syntax to semantics

findings.recommended_action: Archive backward direction, restructure to forward-only TruthLemma
